document_data.name: Arahnar
document_data.Appearance: Arahnar has trim build, dark hair and dark eyes. She has hawkish features. Because of her lycanthropy, she prefers loose-fitted garments that won't tear when she changes shape.
document_data.Equipment: Arahnar carries both a [[dagger]] and a [[short sword]] and is equally dangerous with either.
